name: quadrillion
content:

the number 1,000,000,000,000,000: The system will be capable of more than a quadrillion calculations per second. It would be worth quadrillions of dollars today.
More examplesFewer examplesOne number I heard was that the world was more than a quadrillion dollars in debt.The odds are approximately 137 quadrillion to 1 that the DNA on those items could come from anyone other than the defendant.Previous data showed 2.4 parts per quadrillion.
